short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast editable answers for LinkedIn messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedIn Quick Replies add a modal with 5 editable replies in the messages tab which you can drag-and-drop to answer, spending less than a second to reply to (or ask) the same questions over and over again instead of writing them down or copying from elsewhere.

Free and open source, no tracking or data collecting. Check the links for more info.
